item.title: Learn from An A-Lister, Work Like An A-Lister with MasterClass’ Labor Day Deal
item.description: Martin Scorsese, the Duffer brothers, Shonda Rhimes, Martha Stewart, Neil deGrasse Tyson, Spike Lee, Lewis Hamilton and Gordon Ramsay are just a handful of A-list instructors.

item.title: Learn from An A-Lister, Work Like An A-Lister with MasterClass’ Labor Day Deal
item.description: Martin Scorsese, the Duffer brothers, Shonda Rhimes, Martha Stewart, Neil deGrasse Tyson, Spike Lee, Lewis Hamilton and Gordon Ramsay are just a handful of A-list instructors.

item.title: MasterClass Is 50% Off Through Labor Day
item.description: An annual subscription to MasterClass costs $180 and gets you unlimited access to 90+ courses on the site, with topics ranging from screenwriting to acting to directing
